name: Toxic Pollutants (Visual/Odor)
functionStatement: Physical and chemical processes limit pollutants, retain beneficial constituents, and protect ecological and human uses.
descriptionMarkdown: No visible sheen or strong odor, consistent with an unpolluted stream.
howToMeasureMarkdown: Visual sheen/odor; grab sample if suspect

levels.label: Strongly Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Strong odor, visible seepage, or listed hazardous site on the floodplain. Fish kill reports on record.
Criteria: Severe or chronic contamination.

levels.label: Disagree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Stained soils, debris, or chemical odor near developed or industrial areas. Located downstream of a listed contaminated site.
Criteria: Recognized contamination risk or known moderate contamination.

levels.label: Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: Occasional faint odor near a storm outfall or small dump pile on the floodplain.
Criteria: Minor localized inputs or mild odor only.

levels.label: Strongly Agree
levels.criteriaMarkdown:
Observation: No oily sheen, staining, or chemical odor. Soils appear natural and intact. No impairment listings.
Criteria: No visible contamination indicators or known exceedances.
